data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon now affecting the coast of southern China will moderate progressively today and tomorrow. Temperatures will rise over the region. A fresh easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong in the latter part of this week. The weather is expected to be mainly fine over Guangdong during the weekend to early next week. It will be warm during the day, and relatively humid in the morning and at night.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260210","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"East force 4, occasionally force 5 at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
